statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT respondent_name, response_date, question1 FROM survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, question3 FROM survey_responses ORDER BY respondent_name DESC;
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(question1)), MAX(LENGTH(question2)), MIN(LENGTH(question3)) FROM survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 5 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT response_text, survey_id FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feedback_data WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE respondent_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses SR JOIN feedback_data FD ON SR.respondent_id = FD.respondent_id WHERE SR.response_id = 3;
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY respondent_id HAVING total_responses > 1;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT survey_id, response_date, response_text FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT respondent_id, survey_id, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT question_id, question_text, question_type FROM SurveyQuestions ORDER BY question_id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) as total_responses FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT s.question_text, s.question_type, r.response_text FROM SurveyQuestions s INNER JOIN SurveyResponses r ON s.survey_id = r.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT MAX(id) as max_response_id FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponse;
SELECT respondent_name, response_date FROM SurveyResponse WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, creation_date FROM Survey;
SELECT * FROM SurveyQuestion ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponse WHERE respondent_name='Alice' AND survey_id=1;
SELECT respondent_name, response_date FROM SurveyResponse WHERE response_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT id, question_text FROM SurveyQuestion WHERE survey_id=2 AND question_type='multiple_choice';
SELECT Survey.survey_name, Survey.creation_date, COUNT(SurveyResponse.id) AS response_count FROM Survey LEFT JOIN SurveyResponse ON Survey.id = SurveyResponse.survey_id GROUP BY Survey.id;
SELECT respondent_name, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE respondent_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT id, respondent_id, survey_id, question_id, response FROM survey_responses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT respondent_id, survey_id, question_id, response FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 5;
SELECT survey_name, created_at FROM surveys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM respondents WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM respondents WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT survey_name, created_at FROM surveys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions WHERE id > 5;
SELECT respondent_id, feedback_text, created_at FROM feedback WHERE respondent_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
